name: Mourn One
description:
You infiltrate an enemy base alone and find that they have more numbers than you expect. . luckily, your spaceship won't let you die.  Forever.  As long as you're piloting it.  It's a demon thing.

CONTROLS: Mouse/Touch-support

Hold down any mouse button (or finger) to 

guide your ship and fire.

WHEN YOU DIE: You enter a Ragemode, 

where your batty-ship transforms into

something Powerful.  Spam the Buttons

to swing your heavy sword.

AS TIME PASSES: Your ship learns and upgrades

its own weapon and hull.

*Saves your High Score with Cookies!

Made in 3 days.  Submitted early into the Planet Arcade Jam.

https://itch.io/jam/planet-arcade-jam

PLEASE NOTE: Mourn One's cover art is available as a free download below.  :3
